ai-iti45:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti45:2.1_0: “Enjoy retreat, mendicants, love retreat. Be committed to inner serenity of the heart, don’t neglect absorption, be endowed with discernment, and frequent empty huts.
ai-iti45:2.2_0: A mendicant who enjoys retreat can expect one of two results:
ai-iti45:2.3_0: enlightenment in the present life, or if there’s something left over, non-return.”
ai-iti45:4.4_0: and has drawn near to quenching.”
ai-iti45:5.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
